titles.title: A resolution providing for the further consideration of the bill (H.R. 1748) to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1988 and 1989 for military functions of the Department of Defense and to prescribe military personnel levels for such Department for fiscal years 1988 and 1989, and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-84.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 254 - 149 (Record Vote No: 95).

bill.summary: 5/7/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the further consideration of H.R. 1748 (armed forces funding).
